comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: The location in Botswana given on the location map is wrong, it should be Malawi.  Like Manning, but a little before him, Edwards arrived in B.C.A. in 1893 as a Lieutenant in charge of a company of Sikhs. By 1897 he was Lieut. Colonel and Commandant of the B.C.A. Armed Forces.
